extension_description.message: Generate or scan QR codes offline, no internet connection is required.

open_url_btn_title.message: Open scan result in a new tab

github_link_title.message: Visit QR Lite's project page on Github

error_correction_level_btn_low_title.message: Low, 7% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_medium_title.message: Medium, 15% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_quartile_titl.message: Quartile, 25% of data bytes can be restored

error_correction_level_btn_high_title.message: High, 30% of data bytes can be restored

content_length_label_title.message: Length of the QR code content in characters

context_menu_make_qr_code_for_link.message: Make QR Code For This Link

context_menu_make_qr_code_for_selected_t.message: Make QR Code For Selected Text

context_menu_scan_qr_code_in_image.message: Scan QR Code In This Image

scan_region_picker_tips_html.message:
To scan, draw a rectangle to capture an image of the QR code,
Then right click on the image and choose "Scan QR code in this image".
Press <Esc> to cancel.
